parameters: The house where I lived at the end of that era...
This must be the deepest part of my Memory Space.
There lies nothing else beyond this point.
Is that... in a good way?
Not in any way in particular...
It merely left an impression on me.
What happened? What do you mean?
...Remember how I told you that Ordwald
I haven't heard it from you personally,
but I have known of it for a while.
Tyvar was the one who told us, I think.
I foresaw it a long time ago.
I witnessed the end of the world.
This is where I lived at that time.
so many things weird with your story.
Aren't you saying that the outside
Also, it's weird that you're still alive!
There's nothing NOT weird about this!
I'd also like to hear more details.
Like Fiede has said, Ordwald had already perished.
But if that's so, then Kaamos is──
But the world has begun anew.
Ordwald repeats this process many times
I have to say it's possible.
...and Miss Tahati lived during that turning point.
When you hear that the world is going to end,
you might think of something extreme
But in the end, it was surprisingly quiet.
It was so calm, just like going to sleep.
The moment when everything gave up on life──
as long as you do not lose heart.
There were many others alongside me.
However, that is not to say that the next time
that destruction arrives will be at all similar.
At worst, everything might be completely destroyed.
A place like Ordwald, a second universe.
In the turning point of the era you witnessed,
was there perhaps a girl in black?
In the depths of my memories, the only thing
I could remember before I lost it all...
Was a girl in black, someone known as "Calamity".
I'd like to hear more about that at some point.
In any case, I get that this house
is definitely gonna leave an impression.
So the investigation is over, huh?
I need to call everyone over.
Seriously, no respect for your creator...
\C[17]Memory of Myth\C[0]'s details have been updated.
I was born to be a Lord of Reason, right?
If you're gonna put me up to that task,
why didn't you tell me first!?
In the end, you didn't become a Lord
of Reason, so I didn't bother telling you...
Is it just 'cus I'm a failure!?
Halfway through I just decided to change my
mind and have you be Parlates's guide,
Like how you accompanied Ino on his journey!
But you never listened to me at all,
so I couldn't take you around if I tried...
When someone as kind as Ino came by,
I finally thought I could entrust you to him.
So the reason I don't have any particular
role is entirely my own fault?
A role as a familiar, you mean?
I was such an incompetent failure...
I have never thought of my Familiars
You all are my very dear friends.
The same is true for me, Fiede.
The fact that Fiede has the same restrictions
as a Lord of Reason still holds true, yes?
...As expected, I must still search for it.
A way to travel between the two worlds.
In Ordwald, with Fiede by my side.
...You really do care about Fiede a lot.
I have no intention of returning──
Of course, I cannot linger here too long either.
Well, then I have good news for you!
It's about the concept of Memory Spaces.
If I could understand it better... then maybe.
W-what have you come up with?
Please let me know the details.
Storage areas give form to memories.
been confirmed to exert their own influence...
If only something like that could
And just like that, I got it.
Ino will bring the memories of Parlates
to Ordwald and create a Memory Space there.
After that, my memory will exist in that world.
And with the power of the Tahati in my
memories, I can retrieve you from that world──
If we can work together, we might even
be able to create a bridge between worlds!
However, in order to pull that off,
I have to figure out the conditions
of the creation of Memory Spaces.
And also, my memories must be clearly
And how do we go about doing that?
If we do that, my powers will have
a lasting impression on you, yes?
It sounds great in theory, but
I don't know if I could win...
We just have to fight with all our might.
P-please give me a moment to prepare.
I'll be waiting for you here.
\C[17]Memory of Myth\C[0]'s details have been updated.
Now, let us start a memorable battle.
Now then, let us enter the stage!
Everything about you is so cute!
I feel calm when I'm here.
As if I'm back in my hometown...
It's more normal than I thought.
I was imagining a more mysterious space.
Things floating around for no reason...
誰かと二人で暮らしていたのでしょうか？
the ones we saw in Ainoa.
There's a lively feel about it.
テキストピクチャの設定

parameters.text:
すべてが朽ちてゆく

　　　空が赤く染まるのは、夕日のせいではない
　　　希望がひび割れ、溢れ出した災厄が世界を変えた

　　　滅びの光景は、不思議と美しく見えた
　　　これこそが正しいのだと思えるほどに

parameters.text:
我が弟子はまだ帰らない
　　　彼女は終わりに立ち向かった
　　　旅のさなかに出会ったという仲間たちと共に

　　　皆が信じる、その先にある未来のために
　　　私は私ができることをしよう

Thine existence really fitteth not this place.
...On the contrary, you fit in very nicely.
In such a bright room as this?
of one's shrine under the sea.
Hey, isn't fitting in a compliment!?
...I really just don't get your vibes.
